question:
Consider the following statements about the Electronic vaccine intelligence network (eVIN):
  1. It is an indigenously developed technology system in India
  2. It digitizes vaccine stocks and monitors the temperature of the cold chain through a smartphone application
  3. It is implemented by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The Electronic vaccine intelligence network (eVIN) is an initiative under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. It is an indigenously developed technology system in India. It digitizes vaccine stocks and monitors the temperature of the cold chain through a smartphone application. It is being implemented by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP).
